Title: Relates to the admissibility of evidence created or processed by artificial intelligence
Summary: Sets rules and procedures for the admissibility of evidence created or processed by artificial intelligence.
LawCode: Add ยง60.80, CP L; add ยง4552, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to the admissibility of evidence created or processed by artificial intelligence
